Sept. 26, 1998 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-third-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - trombone - Ogmore. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
May 10, 2015, 7:52 p.m. July 3, 2020, 3:40 p.m.
1 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ceri Lewis Tintagel
2 Cwmbran Band John Burns Oregon: Fantasy for Band
3 Tredegar Youth Band Chris Thomas
4 Newbridge Celynen Band W. F. Shipp
5 Glynneath Silver Band Lynne Turner
6 Oakdale Silver Band Ron Probyn Suite Gothique
7 Ystrad Mynach & District Alan Rowe
